FKE Seminar Series – Dr. Norhafezaidi Mat Saman
===============================================

by [postgraduatepic](https://fke.utm.my/author/postgraduatepic/ "Posts by postgraduatepic")
 | Jul 16, 2024 | [Anouncement](https://fke.utm.my/category/anouncement/)
, [FKESeminarSeries](https://fke.utm.my/category/fkeseminarseries/)
, [Postgraduate-info](https://fke.utm.my/category/postgraduate-info/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/FKE-Seminar-Series-16-Julai-1080x675.jpg)

Assalamualaikum and Salam Sejahtera,

All postgraduate students are cordially invited to attend a seminar organized by the FKE Seminar Committee, which is scheduled as follows:

Speaker: Dr Norhafezaidi Mat Saman  
Title: Unleashing the Application of Plasma: Exploring its Promising Prospects  
Date: 23 July 2024 (Tuesday)  
Time: 2.30 PM – 3.30 PM  
Venue: Active Learning Classroom, Level 5, P19a  
Moderator: Ts Dr Nurul Ashikin Abdul Kadir

We are looking forward to your participation. Thank you.

(Postgraduate students’ attendance will be recorded to fulfill the faculty’s requirement)
